news.headline: HCL Technologies Q3 FY25 Net Profit Rises 5.5% to ₹4,591 Crore
news.text: HCL Technologies reported a 5.5% year-on-year increase in consolidated net profit for Q3 FY25, reaching ₹4,591 crore. Revenue from operations grew by 5% to ₹29,890 crore. The company declared a fourth interim dividend of ₹18 per share, including a ₹6 special dividend to mark 25 years of public listing.

news.headline: HCL Technologies Announces Interim Dividend of ₹18 per Share for FY26
news.text: HCL Technologies announced an interim dividend of ₹18 per share for FY2025–26, with a record date set for April 28 and payment on May 6. In Q4 FY25, net profit rose 8% year-on-year to ₹4,307 crore, and revenue grew 6% year-on-year to ₹30,246 crore.

news.headline: HCL Technologies' Network Solution Wins 'Product of the Year' at 2025 NBA Show
news.text: HCL Technologies' ATSC 3.0 Broadcast Core Network solution was awarded 'Product of the Year' at the 2025 NBA Show for the third consecutive year, recognizing excellence in cloud computing.

news.headline: HCL Technologies' Share Price Surges Over 6% on May 12, 2025
news.text: On May 12, 2025, HCL Technologies' share price surged over 6%, reaching ₹1,666.30, compared to its previous closing price of ₹1,569.90. The stock has shown a 20.15% increase over the past month.
